resources.string: SoluD allows you to solve differential equations using your android mobile device.
What kind of differential equations can SoluD solve?

It can solve many types of differential equations including, Linear differential equations with initial conditions, Linear differential equations without initial conditions, Non-linear differential equations, Inhomogeneous differential equations and Parametric differential equations.
Do i need an Internet connection to retrieve solutions?
Yes. The application requires an active Internet connection to acquire the solutions.
How can I edit an equation after it has been decoded by OCR process?
Press the "Edit manually" button to open the edit User Interface.
I get an error saying "failed to retrieve Image(s)?"
This can happen due to two reasons. Either your solution was not retrieved or the retrieved solution has no graph images. This is the nature of the solution, not a bug.
How can I enlarge the images?
You can tap on an image for it to be displayed on a separate dialog box.
Text processed by OCR is incorrect/partially correct sometimes.
OCR functionality is still under the Beta development stage. Please manually type in the equation or edit the processed text in case of a failure.
